text.0: let every mortal man elect the friendship of the guiding god.
text.1: each one solicits him for wealth and seeks renown to prosper him.
text.2: these leading god are thine and these here ready to speak after us.
text.3: as such may we attain to wealth and wait with services on thee.
text.4: so further honour as our guests the hero gods and then the dames.
text.5: may he remove and keep afar our foes and all who block our path.
text.6: where fire is set and swiftly runs the victim dwelling in the trough.
text.7: he wins with heroes in his home friendly to man like constant streams.
text.8: may these thy riches leader god that rule the car be blest to us.
text.9: yea blest to us for wealth and weal this will we ponder praising strength this ponder as we praise the god.
